;This file is generated by make_sgconfig
;It is best not to edit it since changes will be lost on next generation
;Make changes to make_sgconfig instead


NetworkInterface 
{ 
    Type                Internet                 ; Interface is connected to the Internet
    Ip                  12.191.195.242           ; Static IP address of this interface
    IpMask              255.255.255.0             ; Subnet mask of this interface
    IpGateway           12.191.195.193           ; Gateway of this interface
    Nic                 001422B1E063             ; 6 byte mac address of the NIC
}

NetworkInterface 
{
    Id                  1                        ; Id of the interface.
    Type                Datacenter               ; Interface is connected to the Datacenter
    Ip                  192.168.195.50           ; Static IP address of this interface
    IpEnd               192.168.195.100          ; Static IP address of this interface
    IpMask              255.255.255.0            ; Subnet mask of this interface
    IpGateway           192.168.195.1        		; Gateway of this interface
    Nic                 001422B1E062             ; 6 byte mac address of the NIC.  No '-'.
}

LspProxy
{
    Ip                  192.168.195.219          ; IP address of the LSP proxy
    Port                8000
    SiteId              0x4D530811
}

Service
{
    Id                  0x4D530811
    Name                FightClub
}

Title
{
    TitleId             0x4D53080E
    UserData            "Cryptic_0"
}

Event 
{
    Id                  default
    IntervalSecs        1
}

{

;Port 1 is the special case used for the error tracker
Server
{
    Id                  1			
    Service             FightClub
    Address             { InterfaceId 1 Ip 192.168.195.199 Port 6980 }
}


;servers below this point have algortihmic ports 
;high byte is low order octet of server IP, low byte is port (ranged from 7000 through 7255)
